 Pushes a message string into the internal list of messages.
void ConsoleDump ()
 Dumps the message list into the console.
void FileDump ()
 Dumps the message list into a file. The file name is "Mob2DLog_" and then the date it was generated.

Detailed Description

Mob2DLog: This class stores a list of std::strings that are then used by a separate console class. The two classes work together to provide valuable debugging information.
